en.title: Switch to the app before June 15th!
en.content:
After this date, uploading to Quirkbots will only be possible using the offline app.
[Download the app now.](/download/)

ja.title: Switch to the app before June 15th!
ja.content:
After this date, uploading to Quirkbots will only be possible using the offline app.
[Download the app now.](/ja/download/)

sv.title: Byt till appen före den 15:e Juni!
sv.content:
Efter detta datum kommer det endast gå att ladda upp kod till Quirkbot från vår offline-app.
[Ladda ner appen nu.](/sv/nedladdning/)

pt_BR.title: Migre para o applicativo até dia 15 de Junho!
pt_BR.content:
A partir desta data, o upload para Quirkbots só será possível através do applicativo offline.
[Baixe o applicativo agora.](/pt-br/download/)

zh-Hans-CN.title: 六月15日前切换到应用程序！
zh-Hans-CN.content:
自该日起，您将只能通过我们的应用程序将代码上传至Quirkbot.
[立刻下载程序](/zh-hans-cn/download/)
